title: Freak Man Who Killed Tigers, Peacocks, Boars & Ate Bear Penises Caught After 6-Year-Long Chase
text:
One of the most wanted freaks in India - a tiger poacher who used to eat the penis of sloth bears - has finally been caught by the authorities, after a six-year-long chase.

Reportedly, many sloth carcasses were found by the wildlife officials in the central state of Madhya Pradesh, with their penises missing back in 201,3 and that is when a special task force was formed.

Yarlen, the man who has been arrested, believes that the penis of a sloth bear can cure many illnesses including impotency.

TOI reported that the accused has admitted to killing a number of tigers, sloth bears, hundreds of peacocks and wild boar.

Reportedly, the accused sold the bladders of the bears to people who shared the belief that they have special properties.

An official reportedly said, "He's jumped bail earlier and fudged documents. Over the years, he has taken on several names as well, the latest being Jasrat."

A tigress went missing in the Pench Reserve in 2012, and its hide was found a year later, 1,000 miles away in Nepal. He was arrested the first time in 2014 but released on bail.

In his possessions were recovered more than one Aadhar card, and three fake voter IDs. Apparently, he was able to evade the police all these years as he bribed the heads of every village he moved to, with boars.

Yarlen alias Jasrat alias Luzalen will likely be charged with multiple violations of the Wildlife Protection Act. Not just tigers, even sloth bears are listed as 'vulnerable' species by the International Union for Conservation of Nature.

What this man has been doing all these years, is sick. He should not have been able to get bail in the first place, all those years ago. Indian laws need to be stricter in protecting animals - especially endangered species. The number of fake identities and Aadhar cards the man owned, also brings to the light the discrepancy with the identification system which is marketed as pretty solid.
